fixed_skill.desc: Decrease 1 foe's Defense by 38.8%/40.7%/42.7% for 3 turns.
fixed_skill.name: Rakunda

innate_skill.desc: Deal Wind damage to 1 foe equal to 121.7/127.8/133.9% of Attack. 67.6/71.0/74.4% chance to inflict Windswept for 2 turns.
innate_skill.name: Garudyne

innate_skill.desc: 43.6/45.8/48.0% chance to inflict Sleep on 1 foe for 2 turns.
innate_skill.name: Dormina

passive_skill.desc: Increase Attack by 17.5%. After using a Wind skill on a foe, increase main target's Wind damage taken by 14% for 2 turns.
passive_skill.name: Immortal Bird's Gaze

passive_skill.desc: Increase Attack by 17.5%. After using a Wind skill on a foe, increase main target's Wind damage taken by 15.8% for 2 turns.
passive_skill.name: Immortal Bird's Gaze I

passive_skill.desc: Increase Attack by 17.5%. After using a Wind skill on a foe, increase main target's Wind damage taken by 17.6% for 2 turns.
passive_skill.name: Immortal Bird's Gaze II

passive_skill.desc: Increase Attack by 17.5%. After using a Wind skill on a foe, increase main target's Wind damage taken by 19.4% for 2 turns.
passive_skill.name: Immortal Bird's Gaze III

showtime_skill.desc: Deal Wind damage to all foes equal to 90.0%/96.3%/102.6% of Attack. Increase damage taken by 19.6%/21.0%/22.3% for 2 turns.
showtime_skill.name: Highlight
